message.body: Hey what's the game plan for tonight
Hey! Sorry I was taking a nap. Lol you can ride with us if you want. Up to you. Idk if you plan on staying the whole time
What time are you guys leaving for the place?
I have to do my godmother's hair first
Around 730ish?
Okay I'll keep you posted. I might Just have to meet you there because I'm doing her hair at 6
Okay just let me know
What are you wearing tonight birthday girl
I was debating about a dress but might literally freeze to death lol so probably jeans and some shirt
Haha we had a friendship ball at work today so I'm in a dress and think leggings. I might just wear that
But without the leggings I would die
A friendship ball! How sweet haha
Yes! It was so adorable they wore dresses and suits.
Awwww how cute
It really was but I was like really? It's 4 degrees out and I'm in a dress
Haha I was wearing leggings under my work pants and the wind went right through. I don't know how you did it!
I didn't go very far in them that probably what helped
Hopefully you don't have to go far tonight lol
I know I'm hoping I can catch a ride with you guys or get dropped off we shall see what happens
Hopefully! Let know :)
Sure thing. You got it.
Hey I'm going to get a ride
Should we pick you up?
Oh okay. Sounds good
Okay I'm going to leave here soon, omg she has so much hair do I just ask for your name?
Okay. I should be there within the hour
Sounds good
Could you be my drive home, if need be?
Surely
You're the best.
Happy early birthday! I love you. I had a great time, even the rest of your night. Please no cops :)
Lol no cops tonight! Thanks for coming out! I'm home now. I'm glad you had fun!
I did have a blast. Sorry I couldn't stay the whole time. We need to have dinner soon, since we have to make up for our attempts of last month. Let me know if you get tickets by us
